ai_summary.Response: The documentation for the Microsoft identity platform has been updated.  A new section for August 2025 has been added, detailing an update to the "Microsoft Enterprise SSO plug-in for Apple devices" article, specifically mentioning adjustments to Apple SSO, the token protection image, and troubleshooting secure enclave issues. Previous updates from May 2025 have been removed.
